div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Lake Forest wins the coin toss and will receive and travel west.
Sam Mason kickoff 67 yards to the LFC3, Darrius McKay return 22 yards to the LFC25 (Sam Mason), PENALTY LFC illegal block 10 yards to the LFC15, 1st and 10, LFC ball on LFC15.
